originalText.text: This is an incredible contracting company.They are very professional and the quality of work is top notch. I have been using then for 4 years. They respond very quickly especially when they know there is an issue that has to be fixed immediately. They are a pleasure to work with and so  I highly recommend them!

text.text: This is an incredible contracting company.They are very professional and the quality of work is top notch. I have been using then for 4 years. They respond very quickly especially when they know there is an issue that has to be fixed immediately. They are a pleasure to work with and so  I highly recommend them!

originalText.text: We bought an apartment in Manhattan in the spring of 2019. The apartment needed a gut renovation. We had seen examples of Dutchman’s work and were wowed. They lived up to our expectations. Our apartment is, in our opinion, breathtaking, thanks to the work of Dutchman and our architect, with whom Dutchman has done numerous projects, Claus Rademacher. Two items of particular note in regard to Dutchman. When we launched our project Dutchman predicted an 11-12 month span. When construction was shut down by the pandemic for 3 months, the company began again as soon as they could, with an intact team and brought the project in in a total of 14 1/2 months, right on time minus COVID delay. Even more terrific, They have been incredibly attentive in the months since our move-in, tuning up and tweaking small issues as they’ve been noticed or arisen, as can be expected in any project of this scope. I can’t recommend them highly enough for their commitment to a first-class product.

originalText.text: Dutchman general contracting represents true standard of american craftsmanship, quality and integrity. You are in the good hands with them, for your next high end residential or commercial project in Manhattan, Brooklyn or Westchester. I've known the team for few years now and love their personality, which is important factor as well.
